1.「……ちょっと アンタッ！| 急に ウチに転がり込んできて| 家事のひとつも 手: Hey, you! You just suddenly move in here and|don't even help with the housework?

3.「絶対に 出ていかねえでくださいッ！| このウチは 使えねえ野郎は 大歓迎ですッ: Please don't ever leave! We welcome useless|bastards! Please, keep on smiling!

4.「アッ！ ダストンさま ダメですよ！| モテない サエない 使えないは| ボクの: Aah! Mr. Duston, you can't do this!|Unattractive, unappealing, and useless is my|specialty!

5.「おお <pc>よ！| まともに話せる そちを待っておったぞ！| ここにいる者の: Oh, <pc>! We've been waiting for you|to speak! I don't understand a word you're|saying here.

6.「……ときに ウルベアの遺跡で話した| グルヤンラシュの話 そちは覚えておるか？: ...remember when we talked about Guryan Rush|in the ruins of Urbea?<yesno><close>

7.「グルヤンラシュとは かつて| ウルベア地下帝国に現れた神官でな。| 当時 乱世: Guryan Rush was a Priest who once appeared in|the Urbea Underground City. He was the one who|brought about the turbulent times.

9.「じつは その話 続きがあってな……。| ウルベア皇帝に取り入って 計略をめぐら: Actually, there is a sequel to that story|about Guryan Rush, the man who arranged the|plot against Emperor Urbea.

10.「その正体は 知略に長けた魔物なのじゃ！: He is a monster with a great deal of wiles!

12.「ウルベアを意のままに操ると| 軍事にかたよった 技術革新を推し進め| ガテリア:
Once he had Urbea under his control, he pushed|for military-oriented technological|innovations and started a war with the|
|Imperial State of Gateria.

13.「そのせいで 余の祖国は……。| 許すまじ……！ 奸臣グルヤンラシュ……！: And because of that, my country will never|forgive me.　The wicked Guryan Rush!

14.「いくら時が過ぎたとはいえ あれほどまで| 知略の優れた魔物が 死んでいるとは思: I don't believe that such a clever and|resourceful monster is dead! I'm sure he's|still plotting and scheming!

15.「<pc>よ 頼む。| 余と共に グルヤンラシュの根城に向かい| きゃつの討伐を: I beg of you, <pc>. Will you go with|me to the stronghold of Guryan Rush, and|defeat that thing?

16.「きゃつの根城は おそらく当時のまま| 南の グルグ地下道に あるはずじゃ。|:
The castle of the Kyatu is probably still in|the Gulug Underpass to the south, as it was|back then. Let me take revenge on the enemy of|
|my homeland with my own hands!

17.「うむ！ 苦しゅうないぞよ！| そちがおれば 百人力じゃ！: Mm!　It won't hurt! With you, we're a hundred|strong!

18.「そして おそらく……| あのリウ老師も 余と同じ考えに至り| グルヤンラシュの: And perhaps... that Master Liu must have had|the same thought as I did, and headed for the|defeat of Guryan Rush.

19.「余の家庭教師 リウ老師は グルヤンラシュが| 魔物であることを 早々に見抜いて:
My tutor, Master Liu, had already discovered|early on that Guryan Rush was a monster. He|said he would have to do something about it|
|sooner or later.

20.「リウ老師が 地下遺跡に いなかったのは| 祖国のカタキを討ちに グルヤンラシュ: No doubt Master Liu was not at the underground|ruins because he was on his way to Guryan Rush|to avenge the death of his country!

21.「うまくいけば リウ老師に会えるはずじゃ。| それでは グルヤンラシュの根城へ急: Hopefully, we will be able to meet Master Liu.|Let's hurry to Guryan Rush's castle! I will|follow you!

22.「……ムムッ！| そちは 下々の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており| 余の頼みは 受: Mwah! It seems that you have too many requests|from the lower ranks to accept my request.

23.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。| とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ。: Oh well. I'm a generous man. However, the time|is of the essence. Please help me by finishing|the request as soon as possible.

24.「なんと！ 余の頼みを 断ると申すか！| ……時の流れとは かくも無情なるものか:
How dare you!　You refuse my request! How|merciless is the passage of time. The prestige|of a great nation is like a mere song and|
|dance...

25.「とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ。| そう言わずに 手を貸してくれぬか。|: However, we are in a time sensitive situation.|Don't say that and lend me a hand. I'll be|here. Come again.

26.「おお 待っておったぞ <pc>！| 祖国のカタキ グルヤンラシュを討伐する件|:
Oh, I've been waiting for you, !|You've decided to take on the task of|defeating Guryan Rush, the Kataki of the|
|Fatherland, haven't you?

27.「いくら時が過ぎたとはいえ あれほどまで| 知略の優れた魔物が 死んでいるとは思: I don't believe that such a clever and|resourceful monster is dead! I'm sure he's|still plotting and scheming!

28.「<pc>よ 頼む。| 余と共に グルヤンラシュの根城に向かい| きゃつの討伐を: I beg of you, <pc>. Will you go with|me to the stronghold of Guryan Rush, and|defeat that thing?

29.「きゃつの根城は おそらく当時のまま| 南の グルグ地下道に あるはずじゃ。|:
The castle of the Kyatu is probably still in|the Gulug Underpass to the south, as it was|back then. Let me take revenge on the enemy of|
|my homeland with my own hands!

30.「これから討伐に向かう グルヤンラシュは| ウルベアとガテリアに 戦争をもたらし:
Guryan Rush, whom we are about to defeat, is|the messenger of the turbulent times that|brought war to Urbea and Gateria... the|
|wickedest of the wicked.

31.「きゃつは 魔物でありながら 人間に姿を変え| あやしげな術で ウルベア皇帝の心:
Kyatsu, a monster, disguised himself as a|human and used his mysterious arts to win the|heart of the Emperor Urbea and manipulate the|
|Urbea Underground City to his will. ...

32.「そちには 余と共に きゃつの根城がある| 南の グルグ地下道に 向かってもらう:
You will go with me to the Gulug Underpass in|the south, where the castle of Kyatsu is|located. There, you will avenge the death of|
|my country!

33.「余の家庭教師である リウ老師も| おそらく 余と同じ考えであるはず……。| う: My tutor, Master Liu, probably agrees with|me... and hopefully I will be able to meet him|as well.

34.「それでは グルヤンラシュの根城へ急ごうぞ！| 余は そちの後を ついていくでな: Let's hurry to Guryan Rush's stronghold! I'll|be right behind you! I'll be right behind you!

36.「ハア… ハア……。| この辺りで ひと休みするぞえ……。| こんなに歩いたのは: Haa... haa... we'll take a break around here,|I've never walked so far in my life...

37.「まったく…… そちは スパルタじゃのう。| リウ老師であれば 余を いたわり…: You are a Spartan, aren't you? If you were|Master Liu, you would have taken care of me|and given me frequent breaks.

38.「……まっこと リウ老師は| 完璧な 家庭教師だったぞよ……。: I must say, Master Liu was the perfect|tutor...

39.「……いや。| そういえば 老師にも ひとつだけ| 気に入らぬところが あったわ: No. Come to think of it, there was one thing I|didn't like about the old master.

40.「……リウ老師は ウルベア出身の技術者でな。| その技能は 天下一品と うたわれ:
Master Liu was an engineer from Urbea. His|skills were said to be the best in the world.|That's right. Master Liu made that Demon God|
|Soldier too.

41.「だが グルヤンラシュが現れたころから| リウ老師は ウルベアを離れ……| 余の: But since the time of Guryan Rush, Master Liu|has left Urbea and has been invited to our|country as my tutor.

42.「天下一の技術者を 近くに置き| 余は 心を躍らせたものぞよ。| 誰よりも 優れ: I was thrilled to have the best engineer in|the world close by. I thought I could learn to|do better than anyone else.

43.「……だが リウ老師は| 生きていくのに必要な 最低限の技術しか| 余に 教えて: But Master Liu taught me only the bare minimum|of skills necessary to survive.

44.「これ以上 技術に身をゆだねると| 自分たちの首を絞めることになる……などと|: They said funny things like, "If we give in to|technology any longer, we will strangle|ourselves....

45.「余は それが もどかしくて たまらなかった。| 国王となる 余が 先んじて 技: I was frustrated by this. If I, as the king,|could master the art before the others, I|could even beat the mighty Urbea.

46.「……さてと そろそろ 行かねばな。| 話をしている間に 足腰の疲れも取れたぞよ: Well, I'd better get going. My feet and legs|are getting tired as we speak. Sorry about the|wait, <pc>.

47.「それでは 歩を進めるとするぞえ。| グルヤンラシュの根城まで あと少し……。|: Let's keep moving. We are almost to the castle|of Guryan Rush, and I am sure we will see|Master Liu there.

49.「気をつけよ <pc>。| グルヤンラシュは どこかに身をひそめ| 不意に 襲っ: Be careful <pc>. Guryan Rush may be|hiding somewhere, and may strike unexpectedly.

50.「奸臣グルヤンラシュよ！ 姿を現せい！| 余は ガテリア皇国が 第一の皇子| ビ: O Guryan Rush, the wicked one!　Show yourself!|I am Byan Dao, First Prince of Gateria!

51.「愛する祖国を 滅亡へと追いやった 悪鬼め！| その罪は 万死に値する！ さあ:
You have driven our beloved country to the|brink of destruction, you fiend! Your crimes|are worthy of death!　Come out! I will cut you|
|down with a single stroke of my sword!

53.「老師ッ！！ リウ老師ーッ！！| 余の声が 聞こえるか！？ ビャンが来たぞよ！|: Master Liu!　Master Liu! Can you hear me?　Byan|is here! If he's here, answer me!

55.「……コホン。<pc>よ 苦しゅうない。| もう 楽にしてもよいぞよ。| ここに: ...ahem. <I have no pain. You may relax now.|There seems to be no one here.

56.「グルヤンラシュめ ちょこざいな……。| 余が眠っている間に 根城を変えようとは: Guryan Rush, you're a bit of a trick... It|never occurred to me that you could change|your stronghold while I was sleeping...

57.「<pc> すまぬ。| これまでの苦労が 水の泡となってしもうた。| すべて 余: <pc> I'm sorry. All my hard work has|gone down the drain. It is all my fault.|Please forgive me.

58.「これは そのわびも兼ねた 礼じゃ。| なんとか これで 機嫌を直してたもれ。: This is a courtesy and an apology. I hope this|will somehow put you in a better mood.

59.「リウ老師が この場に いないのも| グルヤンラシュの 新たな根城を追って| こ: Master Liu is not here, probably because he|left this place in pursuit of Guryan Rush's|new stronghold.

60.「のう <pc>よ。| リウ老師のこと 少し話させてくれぬか。| そちには 知っ: You are <pc>. Let me tell you|something about Master Liu. I want you to know|something.

61.「……あれは 余が この時代に来る直前。| リウ老師が いつものように| 余の所: That was just before I came to this time. One|day, when Master Liu came to see me as|usual...

62.「グルヤンラシュの悪魔のささやきに耳を貸した| ウルベア皇帝が ついに 軍を動か: The Emperor Urbea, having listened to the|Demon whisperings of Guryan Rush, has finally|rallied his forces and invaded our Gateria!

63.「長きに渡る抗戦の末 余と リウ老師は| ウルベアに捕えられ 牢獄に入れられた。: After a long struggle, I and Master Liu were|captured by Urbea and thrown into prison. And|I became a bargaining chip...

64.「ガテリアが降伏しなければ 余は処刑……。| 降伏か…… 抗戦か……。| その: If Gateria did not surrender, I would be|executed... surrender... or resist... on the|night of the fateful Judgement...

66.「リウ老師！ どこへ行っておった！| 余を ひとりにするでない！| 心細かったで: Master Liu!　Where have you gone? Don't leave|me here alone! Don't leave me here all alone!

67.「それよりも なぜ 牢の外に出ておる！| 余が眠っている間に 何があったのじゃ！: But more importantly, why are you out of your|cell? What happened while I slept? Have we|been freed?

68.「聡明なる皇子 ビャン・ダオさま……。| どうか 心を静め 私の話をお聞きくださ: Wise Prince Byan Dao please calm your mind and|listen to what I have to say.

69.「遺憾ながら あなたさまの お父上は……: I regret to inform you that your father...

70.「ウルベア帝国の侵攻に対し| 徹底抗戦の意を 表明されました……！: He has expressed his determination to resist|the invasion of the Urbea Empire...!

71.「それと同時に ガテリア兵が なだれ込み……| 私は その混乱に乗じて 牢を開け:
At the same time, Gateria's soldiers rushed|in... and I took advantage of the chaos to|open the prison and bring you here. I took|
|advantage of the chaos.

73.「ビャンさま！ お気を確かに！| 我々に残された時間は あとわずか……！| いず: Lady Byan!　Be careful! We only have a few|hours left. The enemy will find us here!

74.「さあ ビャンさま。御身を守るため| どうか これに お乗りください。: Come on, Master Byan. For your own protection,|please get on this.

75.「これは 私が ウルベアにいたとき| 極秘で研究していた 魔神兵にございます。|: This is the Urbea Aztech that I studied in|secret when I was in Urbea. I will take the|prince to a safe place.

76.「イ…イヤじゃ！ 余 ひとりでは イヤじゃ！| リウ老師ッ！ そなたも乗るのじゃ: No!　I won't go alone! Master Liu!　You must|ride too!

77.「この魔神兵は もうひとつございます。| 私も 後から魔神兵に乗りますゆえ| ど: There is another Demon God Soldier. I will be|riding in the Demon Soldier later, so please|don't worry...

78.「さあ 早く！| 敵兵に 見つかる前に……！: Come on, quickly! Before the enemy sees us!

79.「……こうして 余は リウ老師の手によって| あの 特別な魔神兵に 乗せられ|: And so, I was placed by Master Liu on that|special demon soldier and brought to this time|period.

80.「魔神兵は 本来 棺の役目を果たすもの……。| 死後 復活をとげる前に 肉体が朽: Demon soldiers essentially serve as coffins...|to preserve and protect the body from decay|after death before the resurrection.

81.「リウ老師は それを改良し 人を生かしたまま| 保存できる技術を 研究していたの: Master Liu must have been working on a|technology to improve it and keep people|alive. That's what saved my life.

82.「……父上は 余の命よりも 国を選んだ。| リウ老師が逃がしてくれなかったら|: My father chose his country over my life. If|Master Liu had not let me go, I would have|been executed...

83.「結局 余のことを心配してくれたのは| リウ老師だけであった……。| 老師は 余: After all, the only one who cared about me was|Master Liu... Master Liu is very special to|me.

84.「……のう <pc>よ。| 余は リウ老師に会いたいぞよ。| そのために またチ: You <pc>. I want to see Master Liu.|And for that, I need your help again.

85.「リウ老師は きっと どこかにいるはずじゃ。| 後から魔神兵に乗ると| 別れ際に: Master Liu must be somewhere around here. He|promised me when we parted that he would ride|in the Demon Soldier later.

86.「ひとまず 余は ガラクタ屋敷に戻り| 今後のことを 考えることにするぞえ。|: For now, I'm going back to the junk house to|think about the future. Please come back to|check on me again.
